name: illegal_table
sql: SELECT * FROM users
errors: Table users is not allowed

name: two_illegal_tables
sql: SELECT col1 FROM users AS u1 JOIN products AS p1
errors: Table users is not allowed
Table products is not allowed

name: select_no_legal_cols
sql: SELECT col1, col2 FROM orders WHERE id = 123
errors: Column col1 is not allowed. Column removed from SELECT clause
Column col2 is not allowed. Column removed from SELECT clause
No legal elements in SELECT clause

name: select_star
sql: SELECT * FROM orders WHERE id = 123
errors: SELECT * is not allowed
fix: SELECT id, product_name, account_id, day FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: select_star_with_column
sql: SELECT product_name, * FROM orders WHERE id = 123
errors: SELECT * is not allowed
fix: SELECT product_name, id, product_name, account_id, day FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: select_star_with_column_and_alias
sql: SELECT product_name AS "p_n", * FROM orders WHERE id = 123
errors: SELECT * is not allowed
fix: SELECT product_name AS "p_n", id, product_name, account_id, day FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: two_cols
sql: SELECT id, product_name FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: quote_and_alias
sql: SELECT "id" AS my_id FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: sql_with_group_by_and_order_by
sql: SELECT id FROM orders GROUP BY id ORDER BY id
errors: Missing restriction for table: orders column: id value: 123
fix: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE id = 123 GROUP BY id ORDER BY id

name: sql_with_where_and_group_by_and_order_by
sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE product_name = '' GROUP BY id ORDER BY id
errors: Missing restriction for table: orders column: id value: 123
fix: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE (product_name = '') AND id = 123 GROUP BY id ORDER BY id

name: col_expression
sql: SELECT col + 1 FROM orders WHERE id = 123
errors: Column col is not allowed. Column removed from SELECT clause
No legal elements in SELECT clause

name: select_illegal_col

errors: Column col is not allowed. Column removed from SELECT clause
fix: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: missing_restriction
sql: SELECT id FROM orders
errors: Missing restriction for table: orders column: id value: 123
fix: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: wrong_restriction
sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE id = 234
errors: Missing restriction for table: orders column: id value: 123
fix: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE (id = 234) AND id = 123

name: table_and_database

name: function_call
sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT id) FROM orders_db.orders AS o WHERE id = 123

name: function_call_illegal_col

errors: Column col is not allowed. Column removed from SELECT clause

name: table_prefix

name: table_and_db_prefix

name: table_alias

name: table_alias_illegal_col

errors: Column status is not allowed. Column removed from SELECT clause
fix: SELECT a.id FROM orders AS a WHERE a.id = 123

name: bad_restriction
sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE id = 123 OR id = 234
errors: Missing restriction for table: orders column: id value: 123
fix: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE (id = 123 OR id = 234) AND id = 123

name: bracketed
sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE (id = 123)

name: double_bracketed
sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE ((id = 123))

name: static_exp

fix: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: only_static_exp

errors: Static expression is not allowed: 1 = 1
Missing restriction for table: orders column: id value: 123
fix: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: only_static_exp_false
sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE 1 = 0

fix: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE (FALSE) AND id = 123

name: static_exp_paren
sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE id = 123 OR (1 = 1)
errors: Static expression is not allowed: 1 = 1
fix: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: two_static_exps
sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE id = 123 OR (1 = 1) OR (2 = 2)
errors: Static expression is not allowed: 1 = 1
Static expression is not allowed: 2 = 2
fix: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: static_exp_with_missing_restriction
sql: SELECT id, name FROM orders WHERE 1 = 1
errors: Column name is not allowed. Column removed from SELECT clause
Static expression is not allowed: 1 = 1
Missing restriction for table: orders column: id value: 123
fix: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE id = 123

name: nested_static_exp
sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE id = 123 OR (id = 1 OR TRUE)
errors: Static expression is not allowed: TRUE
Missing restriction for table: orders column: id value: 123
fix: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE (id = 1 OR id = 123) AND id = 123

name: nested_static_exp2

errors: Static expression is not allowed: TRUE
fix: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE id = 123 AND product_name = 'product1'

name: multiple_brackets_exp
sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE (( ( (id = 123))))

name: with_clause
sql: WITH data AS (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE id = 123) SELECT id FROM data

name: nested_with_clause

errors: Missing restriction for table: orders column: id value: 123
fix: WITH data AS (WITH sub_data AS (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE id = 123) SELECT id FROM sub_data) SELECT id FROM data

name: nested_with_clause

fix: WITH data AS (SELECT id FROM orders WHERE id = 123) SELECT id FROM data

name: lowercase
sql: with data as (select id from orders as o where id = 123) select id from data

name: sub_select
sql: SELECT id, sub_select.col FROM orders CROSS JOIN (SELECT 1 AS col) AS sub_select WHERE id = 123

name: sub_select_expression

fix: SELECT id, account_id FROM (SELECT 123 AS id, account_id FROM orders WHERE id = 123) AS a1 WHERE id = 123

name: with_and_json_object
skip-reason: Parser replaces comma with colon inside json_object
